title: Tether retreats from $20bn funding ambitions after investor pushback
snippet: CEO Paolo Ardoino downplays the scale of $185bn stablecoin group’s capital raise

title: Rails taps Stellar to launch onchain vaults for institutional derivatives liquidity
snippet: Rails is betting that Stellar‑based smart contract vaults, onchain proofs and segregated collateral can make high‑speed perpetuals more palatable to institutions.

title: Fireblocks integrates Canton Network for regulated onchain settlement
snippet: The integration allows institutions to custody and settle assets on the privacy-enabled blockchain built for regulated financial markets.

title: IPO Genie Introduces New Tokenized Diversification Framework for Private Equity Assets. - Digital Journal
snippet: IPO Genie Introduces New Tokenized Diversification Framework for Private Equity Assets. Digital Journal

title: MetaMask adds tokenized US stocks, ETFs, commodities via Ondo
snippet: The rollout provides access to tokenized US stocks, ETFs and commodities through Ondo GM tokens for non-US users on Ethereum, excluding 30 jurisdictions at launch.

title: Crypto.com launches standalone prediction market app ‘OG’
snippet: Crypto.com has spun out its prediction markets business into a standalone platform after reporting explosive growth, entering a crowded but booming industry.

title: Crypto dev launches website for agentic AI to ‘rent a human’
snippet: The site lets users set an hourly rate for tasks from errands to business meetings. It was built using AI agents in a "Ralph loop," a form of vibe coding.

title: Singapore Gulf Bank Launches Regulated Fiat-Stablecoin Network for Asia and GCC - The Fintech Times
snippet: Singapore Gulf Bank Launches Regulated Fiat-Stablecoin Network for Asia and GCC The Fintech Times

title: Crypto Dev Launches Site for AI to Hire Humans
snippet: Riding OpenClaw’s viral moment, a new startup called RentAHuman.ai pitches itself as the “meatspace layer” for autonomous agents—letting bots pay people to do the things software still can’t.

title: Canada’s investment watchdog rolls out crypto custody rules to avoid another QuadrigaCX
World Liberty launches $3.4B stablecoin: How it fits into onchain credit systems
snippet: World Liberty launches a $3.4-billion stablecoin and lending platform, positioning it within onchain credit, collateralized loans and DeFi markets.

title: Novogratz’s Galaxy Digital posts $482 million loss as cash pile swells
snippet: Thanks to equity raises, the company grew its cash and stablecoins reserves by 36% when compared to the previous quarter.

title: Y Combinator opens stablecoin funding option for startups starting Spring 2026
snippet: YC's Nemil Dalal told The Block that funding will be in USDC across major blockchain networks, including Ethereum, Base, and Solana.

title: Sumsub achieves travel rule compliance for digital assets with Fireblocks
snippet: Sumsub, a global full-cycle compliance and fraud prevention platform, today announced its partnership with Fireblocks, an enterprise platform providing digital asset infrastructure solutions to businesses building on blockchain, to deliver seamless and secure Travel Rule compliance.

title: Avalanche Policy Coalition unveils advisory council, calls for ‘global energy’ as crypto rules across the world take shape
snippet: The Avalanche Policy Coalition unveiled a new advisory council, led by Ava Labs General Counsel Lee Schneider.

title: Taurus selects Capco as implementation partner in Europe
snippet: Taurus SA, a leader in enterprise-grade digital asset infrastructure, today announced a strategic partnership with global management and technology consultancy Capco, a Wipro company.

title: Spanish Red Cross launches privacy-first blockchain aid platform
snippet: The Spanish Red Cross is rolling out RedChain, a privacy-preserving blockchain aid system that gives donors cryptographic proof of impact without exposing beneficiary identities.

title: Real-world assets don’t need new gatekeepers
snippet: Permissioned blockchains and centralized layer 2s rebuild intermediaries for tokenized assets. Based rollups inherit Ethereum security while enabling compliance.

title: Lydian enables crypto acceptance for Fiserv Clover merchants
snippet: Fiserv merchants with Clover POS systems will soon be able to accept payments in crypto and stablecoins through a collaboration with digital asset firm Lydian

title: Canada’s investment watchdog sets new rules for crypto custody
snippet: The framework sets a tiered structure for custodians, determining the proportion of client assets they can hold.

title: Tian Ruixiang outlines 15,000-Bitcoin equity deal with strategic investor
snippet: The Nasdaq-listed insurance brokerage said an unidentified investor would contribute Bitcoin in exchange for equity, alongside an AI- and crypto-focused partnership.

title: Bank Of America Weighs Stablecoin Rewards Talks And Valuation Upside - simplywall.st

title: Euro stablecoins will reach €1.1bn by 2030, says S&P Global Ratings
snippet: Euro-backed stablecoins are expected to grow fast in Europe, according to S&P Global Ratings.

title: Bitcoin tests $73,000, erasing gains since Trump’s election night win
snippet: A Glassnode analyst noted that 44% of the bitcoin supply is "now underwater," given that the token has dropped about 30% in the past month.

title: Non-custodial crypto wallet Safe reports fivefold revenue jump in 2025, not yet at ‘break-even’ profitability
snippet: The non-profit Safe foundation said the project is “not yet profitable,” though the team hopes to "break-even and double revenue in 2026."

title: Australian Banks Imposing 'Unlawful Regulatory Ban' on Crypto, Says Coinbase
snippet: Coinbase tells Australia that bank opacity on crypto account closures has created "a crisis of confidence" in the financial system.

title: S&P projects 1,600x upper-bound increase in euro stablecoin issuance to $1.3 trillion by 2030
snippet: S&P says the euro stablecoin market cap could reach €1.1 trillion by 2030, equivalent to 4.2% of eurozone bank deposits.

title: Banking on Stablecoins: Accelerating Cross-Border Payments in the US, UK and Europe
snippet: What are the strategic opportunities for banks in these regions to use stablecoins in cross-border payments, and how do they differ across jurisdictions?

title: Stablecoin ‘dust’ txs on Ethereum triple post-Fusaka: Coin Metrics
snippet: Analysis of 227 million USDC and USDT balance updates found that 43% were dust transfers under $1, said Coin Metrics.

title: Ark Invest scoops up more Bitmine, Circle shares as crypto slump continues
snippet: Ark Invest CEO Cathie Wood recently indicated on X that gold's recent price rally could be a precursor to bitcoin's next bull run.

title: Here’s what happened in crypto today
